title: Wand of Frosting
summaries: The Wand of Frosting is an early-game magic weapon. It fires a spark along a parabolic curve, traveling about 16 tiles before dissipating. The spark can pierce one enemy and has a 50*1/2 (50%) chance to inflict the Frostburn debuff for 2 seconds (66.67*2/3 (66.67%) chance) or 3 seconds (33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance). It deals no knockback.
Its best modifier is Demonic or Deadly, with the former granting improved critical strike chance and the latter granting improved speed. It cannot get modifiers that affect knockback or mana cost.
